recipe: Egg Onion Omelette: Beat eggs, add chopped onions, salt, pepper. Cook on pan until golden.
Egg Tomato Scramble: Scramble eggs with chopped tomato, salt, and cook for 5 minutes.
Potato Onion Fry: Fry chopped potatoes and onions with oil, turmeric, and salt.
Chicken Onion Curry: Cook chicken with onions, spices, and simmer for 20 minutes.
